summary: GOOD MORNING!      I AM HAVING TROUBLE WITH THE DOOR HANDLES ON MY 2004 NISSAN MURANO SL.  THE FRONT PASSENGER SIDE HANDLE BROKE OFF ONE MORNING WHEN I TRIED OPENING THE DOOR, ABOUT ONE YEAR AGO.  NOW, TWO WEEKS AGO, I WAS OPENING THE DRIVER'S SIDE FRONT DOOR, AND AGAIN THE HANDLE BROKE OFF.  *TR
